procedure.title: Basic Safety Training
procedure.description: Introductory training covering general workplace safety rules, PPE usage, emergency exits and how to report unsafe conditions.

procedure.title: Fire Drill Procedure
procedure.description: Practical simulation of a fire emergency, including alarm recognition, evacuation routes and assembly point procedures.
procedure.requirements: Completion of Basic Safety Training recommended.
procedure.equipment: Comfortable shoes, access card for building

procedure.title: First Aid Basics
procedure.description: Covers basic first aid principles: recovery position, CPR overview, bleeding control and how to contact emergency services.
procedure.equipment: First aid kit, CPR manikin (if available)

procedure.title: Evacuation Procedure Drill
procedure.description: Detailed walkthrough of the building evacuation plan, including roles of fire wardens and communication flow during an incident.
procedure.requirements: Participation in at least one prior fire drill.

procedure.title: Chemical Handling Safety
procedure.description: Focuses on safe handling, storage and disposal of hazardous chemicals, including reading safety data sheets (SDS).

procedure.title: Ergonomics at Work
procedure.description: Teaches correct posture, workstation setup and micro-break routines to reduce musculoskeletal strain for office workers.
procedure.equipment: Office chair and desk for demonstration
